description: Returns information about a list of OpenSearch Serverless access policies.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Resource filters (can be collections or indexes) that policies can apply to. (string) ---

nested_items.name: accessPolicySummaries
nested_items.description: Details about the requested access policies.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of access policy. Currently, the only available type is data.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the access policy.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the access policy.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The Epoch time when the access policy was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the collection was last modified.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page.
